participant_1.background:
My biggest challenge was having to work from home and not being able to interact with my colleagues in person.
I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i have always enjoyed telling stories to people.
i am afraid of clowns.

participant_2.background:
I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.
i am a deaf man.
I read fantasy novels to escape my reality.
I play music to cheer myself up.
i love to eat shrimp and lobster.

content.text: I'm good, thank you. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy reading fantasy novels to escape my reality.
What are some of your favorite books?
I really enjoyed the Lord of the Rings series, and the Harry Potter series.
I've heard good things about both of those series. I'm more of a nonfiction reader myself, but I do enjoy a good fantasy novel from time to time.
What type of nonfiction do you enjoy reading?
I like to read about history, science, and technology.
I'm not much of a science or technology person, but I do enjoy learning about history.
What time period are you most interested in?
I'm mostly interested in ancient history, especially the Roman Empire.
The Roman Empire is a fascinating subject. I've always been interested in their history and culture.
Me too. I'm also interested in ancient Egypt.
Ancient Egypt is another fascinating culture. I've always wanted to visit the pyramids.
It would be amazing to see the pyramids in person. I'm not sure if I'll ever get to travel to Egypt, but it's definitely on my bucket list.
It's definitely worth a visit if you ever get the chance
